synopsis.text:
Minare Koda, a restaurant worker from Sapporo, Hokkaido, finds herself in the spotlight after an unplanned rant about her recent heartbreak is aired on local radio. After a night of drowning her sorrows, she unknowingly shares her woes with Kanetsugu Matou, a radio station director. The next day, Minare is mortified to hear her own voice broadcasting her personal troubles.

In her haste to halt the broadcast, she inadvertently lands herself an impromptu interview on-air. Her raw, energetic dialogue catches Matou's attention, who recognizes her potential. This unexpected turn of events leads Minare to become a late-night talk show host, juggling her day job and personal life alongside her newfound career.

As she delves deeper into the world of radio, Minare shares amusing tales from her chaotic life, unwittingly captivating her audience. The anime series "Wave, Listen to Me!" follows Minare's journey, offering a unique blend of humor, drama, and a touch of romance, all set against the backdrop of the bustling city of Sapporo.
